short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminders to take breaks every 20 minutes, looking 20 feet away for 20 seconds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you suffer from eye strain or work at a computer screen for long periods of time, try the Eye Saver Tab extension. This new tab extension reminds you every 20 minutes to give your eyes a break and follow best practices in preventing eye strain throughout your workday. 

Please note this extension provides a new tab experience and features a web search powered by Yahoo!

Permissions requested by this extension: 
Notifications -- Notifies you when to take a break. 
Storage - Stores 20 minute countdown. 

Privacy Policy: https://eyesavertab.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: https://eyesavertab.com/terms-of-service/
About Us: https://eyesavertab.com/about-us/
Contact Us: https://eyesavertab.com/contact/
Uninstall Info: https://eyesavertab.com/uninstall/
